column1: Definition for Latitude and Longitude values
Negative values indicate South of the Equator or  West of the Greenwich Meridian
Latitude A = Southern Latitude of the bounding box (decimal degrees)
Longitude A = Western Longitude of the bounding box (decimal degrees)
Latitude B = Northern Latitude of the bounding box (decimal degrees)
Longitude B = Eastern Longitude of the bounding box (decimal degrees)
Null values are represented by -99 and -999 for longitude
